column1: '''''Ancrene Wisse and Hali Meiðhad''''' is a [[1929]] essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] on the 13th century early [[Middle English]] treatise Ancrene Wisse "The Anchoresses' Rule"
column2: and on the tract on virginity Hali Meiðhad "Holy Maidenhood". In the essay
column3: which has been called "the most perfect though not the best-known of his [Tolkien's] academic pieces"
column7: p. 45</ref> he coined the term "[[AB language]]".<ref>J.R.R. Tolkien
